value:
$WmMPID_ナレーション,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|This is a story of another time,
in another world...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Sharena! Have there been
any changes in Prince Alfonse and
and Commander Anna's conditions?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our healers are doing everything
they can, but...it's still too early to
tell if they'll make it...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|If Gullveig's invasion is allowed to
continue at this pace...$k$pAll who stand against her will be
utterly destroyed.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The Order of Heroes is the final
hope for the people, but what can
we do against such power?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The enemy's assaults grow fiercer by
the day. We can barely hold the line,
much less engage in a counterattack.$k$pOur forces have only been further
enfeebled by the loss of Commander
Anna and Prince Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|How can we possibly win against
such a powerful foe?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Do not give in to despair, children
of Midgard. Gullveig is not as
unstoppable as she seems.$k$pIt is possible that we have already
defeated her a number of times.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Are you implying that she has
been reversing time to ensure
our defeat?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I shall venture once more to the
realm of light, Vanaheimr.$k$pThere, I will continue my search
for a way through which we may
put an end to Gullveig's terror.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Seiðr...good luck. We will hold
steady in our defenses here while
you're away.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|I'd be happy to escort you to the
gates of light, Seiðr! We can't have
you getting lost again, after all.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Oh, um...yes. Thank you.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|I wonder if there is a way we can
help fight back too so Seiðr doesn't
have to shoulder the burden alone...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_ELECTION023,Face|Princess Sharena, could we borrow
you for a moment?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Certainly. Oh, were you all
holding a strategy meeting?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_ELECTION023,Face|Indeed. We've been theorizing
a more...unconventional way to
counter Gullveig.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I'm willing to listen to any plan
at this point. Let's hear it.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_ELECTION023,Face|I should warn you that this is less of
a plan and more of a gamble.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_ELECTION023,Face|We recommend summoning
Gullveig as a Hero and binding
her to a contract.$k$pThen, we can pit her against the
enemy version of Gullveig.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? Is that even possible?$k$p$WmMPID_アウグスト,ch07_17_August_M_Normal,Face|Such a confrontation should be at
least evenly matched. Fighting fire
with fire, as it were.$k$p$WmMPID_サイアス,ch07_05_Cyas_M_Normal,Face|I'm uncertain whether the summoner
will be able to establish a connection,
but we must try.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_ELECTION023,Face|Of course, the full force of the Order
would also be behind the summoned
Gullveig. She would not fight alone.$k$p$WmMPID_ユリシーズ,ch11_31_Ulysses_M_Normal,Face|Do also consider that, should this fail,
we may find ourselves pitted against
two Golden Seers instead of one.$k$pIn that situation, we may as well don
our brightest smiles and try to win
the day with loquaciousness, hm?$k$p$WmMPID_ヒューベルト,ch17_06_Hubert_M_Normal,Face|Oh, don't worry. While you are busy
greeting oblivion with a smile, the rest
of us will think of something useful.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What do you think,
$Nu?$k$p$EFace|Wait, I know that look... You'll do it?
If you're sure... Thank you.$k$pIt seems like the fate of Askr is once
again in the hands of our summoner.
We're counting on you.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_総選挙カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_ELECTION023,Face|$Fi1500|Robin, I heard you intend to move
forward with the plan to summon
another version of Gullveig.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_ELECTION023,Face|Yes. It's a dangerous play, but it's the
only real chance we have.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_ELECTION023,Face|If it's so risky, why don't we at least
wait for Seiðr to return? Maybe she'll
find something in Vanaheimr.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_ELECTION023,Face|The enemy is at our doorstep
and you want to wait?$k$pNo. The summoning has already
begun. If this plan is going to fail,
we will know shortly.$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|$w0|That light... Did it work? Did you
actually summon Gullveig?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_ELECTION023,Face|I-I can't believe it! The plan worked...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_ELECTION023,Face|Hm... How interesting...$k$p
